name: Goofy's Juice
description: Semi-tobacco (RY4 styled) with peanut butter and hazelnut cream.
author: VladimirosStafylidis

reviews.text: I love this. Always have some on My MTL. Nice balance. A really tasty Ry4 with peanut. Thanks

Love this juice. First recipe I followed. Very different for me!
Constantly got one steeping since then

this is the best rated recipe in elr for so long time.i have mixed it so many times and in so many variations.really not much to say,for me this is the best semi tobacco recipe i have tried.the longer it steeps,the better it tastes.
Really tasty. Mixed this up a few times now. Really well crafted
Really enjoy this recipe. That peanut butter is subtle but really nicely balanced with the RY4.
